title: Under Russiaâ€™s Rain of Fire in Kherson, Ukrainians Sneak Forward
description: The commander of a Ukrainian reconnaissance unit spearheading the counterattack in the southern region of Kherson explained how his team helped breach defenses he described as frighteningly dense.
dc:creator: Carlotta Gall and Ivor Prickett
media:credit: Ivor Prickett for The New York Times
